body.name: NOVA ACTIVE Workout Sets for Women 2 Piece High Waisted Seamless Leggings with Padded Stretchy Sports Bra Sets Gym Clothes
features: MATCHING WORKOUT OUTFITS FOR WOMEN BECOME FASHION TREND - We design unique color workout sets for women, let you stand out bright eye when you’re exercising. New seamless craft sports bra matched high-waist leggings, with a wide, high rise waistband with tummy control, contours your curves and streamlines the natural shape of your waist, make you feel confident and supportive during training.

SUPER VALUE TWO PIECE WOKROUT SETS PACK - This workout sets is our new collection comes in a range of vibrant colors, enjoy the power of being young. Matched with same color womens activewear reduce the trouble of matching clothes every day.

UPGRADE SEAMLESS CRAFT SOLVE SEE THROUGH ISSUES - Used thicker yarn, improve knitting dense, increase the elasticity, really non-see through. Because this 2 piece seamless yoga sets was knitted, if stretch too large, there will be some seams, we recommend wearing light-colored underwear to avoid embarrassment.

ULTRA HIGH WAISTED WORKOUT LEGGINGS - Our women’s workout leggings with widened double layered ribbed waistband, in order to make a better tummy control yoga pants, contour your hips and thighs. Additionally, the triangle design of crotch makes you feel safe to do deep squat. when you wear these yoga pants, you will feel comfortable stretch and freedom of movement.

PADDED WIRE FREE SOFT SPORTS BRA - The padded bra use moisture wicking light-weight sponge pad cups. Four-way stretch bra with removable pads can supports different cups (A-E cups), show off your graceful curves, lining bag design easy for replacement and cleaning. In addition, the generous shoulder straps make you more comfortable to wear, without putting pressure on your shoulders.

Do the sports bras have padding in them Yes, there are two removable padding in it, and the tank top bra gives a lot support Are they see through? They are absolutely not see-through at all. Do the yoga pants slide down when running or jumping? No! These are the real deal.. tight workout quality material. I wear them even when not working out! Buy them! I'm 5' 2" and weigh 136, what size should I get? (Little up top and big bottom) I think size M would fix perfectly on you. What’s the way to wash it? Hot or cold water. Delicate. Etc? I wash it on regular, cold water setting and it's been fine. No discoloration. And, it looks as good as the day I bought it.

Black Workout Sets for Women Workout crop tops for women & yoga pants Our workout black tank top for women are constructed with soft, stretch, breathable fabric.Features wide shoulder straps, offers great control, support and comfort for workouts or as your everyday bra. And prevent the bra translocating. Workout tank tops for women Designed with removable padding Widen elastic design,emphasis on flexibility,you will not feel restrictive when you are in gym. You also don't have to worry about this summer outfits being see-through,our fabric is thick enough to not be see-through while being stretched out. Workout Leggings for Women Yoga pants Fit the design of the foot, gently wrap your legs. High waisted leggings give you a lot surpot. Modify your ankles and lengthen the legs. Nice cut, naturally breathable moisture-wicking performance fabric, provides cozy-soft feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE ! I want to get every color
reviews.reviewText: I love this set ! It’s so comfy and fits so great and I love the color ! I will deff be getting it in other colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing set. Better than $130 leggings!
reviews.reviewText: I wear this set for Pilates. I have tried alo, Ivl, lululemon, Zella, spanx, beach riot, nike, athleta, gap, an alala leggings (probably others) and for the price this set is incredible! The leggings have the perfect amount of compression and the sports bra is both easy to get on but very supportive. The best thing is that these leggings stay up!!! Nothing is worse in my opinion than when leggings get loose and stretch out. These leggings have a slight ribbed fabric which is very flattering on the body. Also, I’ve washed them about a dozen times and they wash and dry perfectly. I couldn’t imagine having the hassle of line drying workout clothes. Lastly, the price can not be beat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and not too much compression
reviews.reviewText: Love the color, fit and comfort. I was worried it would have too much compression and e uncomfortable but it was not! I was able to wear all day and not feel like I couldn’t breathe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tru to size and def comfy
reviews.reviewText: Merch came quicker than expected and it is exactly as described by seller. Very happy with delivery and product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this set and I think the quality is great - especially for the price. But I don’t think it’s very flattering for shorter girls. I’m 5’3 and the pants go up way past my belly button, making me look even shorter. I’ve had this set for about 6 months now and material is intact though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The color is beautiful. The fabric is so soft! Love love love

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy with some alterations
reviews.reviewText: I love this colour, and the price for an entire set was great. The material is stretchy and thick and I feel amazing in it. However, I had to have it altered as the waist was still too big for me. I ordered a small and it flared off at the waist leaving a gap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but ripped as soon as I squatted and you were able to see my underwear through the back
reviews.reviewText: They were really cute but as soon as I did a squat test they ripped down the seam. My fiance also let me know that they were seethrough from the back. Coming from a girl with a small caboose shocked by the sheerness I'd say not worth it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Se ve celulitis sobre la tela
reviews.reviewText: No me gustó que puedo ver la celulitis de piernas y glúteos a través del leggins. No lo volvería a comprar. El top si me encantó. Quizá lo combine con otro leggins
